entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the main subject of hate mail and Howlers. She is also mentioned as being in a supposed triangle with Harry and Krum.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid advises Hermione to stop opening hate mail.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being in a supposed triangle with Hermione and Krum. He also tells people that Hermione isn't his girlfriend.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is mentioned as being in a supposed triangle with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: witch weekly
entities.description: Witch Weekly magazine publishes stories about the supposed Harry-Krum-Hermione triangle.

relationships.description: Harry tells people that Hermione isn't his girlfriend.
